Name: Soldier
Description: Melee range. Kinda stupid. Useful cannon fodder.

Name: Ranger
Description: Long range. Good at throwing stuff.

Name: Bully
Description: Melee range. Just wants to steal lunch money. Can be tricked into helping.

Name: Healer
Description: Area of Effect. Can't fight, but keeps kids alive longer to suffer more.

Name: Snitch
Description: Can't fight, but good at snooping. Keep them busy so they don't report you.

Name: Farmer
Description: Can't fight, but has a shovel to collect sand. Possibly useful.

Name: Candy Factory
Description: Place to store candy you bribe your kid army with.

Name: Sandpit
Description: It's rough and coarse, he hates it.
